post.text: "If a candidate regularly and flippantly makes cruel and insulting comments about women—about how we look, how we act—well, sadly, that's who that candidate really is." —Michelle Obama

comment.author: Jeremy
comment.text: Giant Ring Of Trump Supporters Busted For Rigging Online Polls Those online polls that Trump keeps tweeting as proof of his victory at the presidential debate were rigged by rings of Trump supporters who manipulated the polling. http://www.politicususa.com/2016/09/27/giant-ring-trump-supporters-busted-rigging-online-polls.html

replies.author: Jeremy
replies.text: Clearly, you do not comprehend the meaning of the post.
